5368.superDescription:
Raises ATK, raises DEF for 1 turn, 
causes immense damage to enemy 
and greatly lowers ATK

Active Skill.Name: Greatest Show in the Universe
Active Skill.Effect Description:
Causes ultimate damage to enemy and 
disables enemy's action once within the turn
Active Skill.Condition Description:
Can be activated when there is 
a "Low-Class Warrior" Category enemy, 
when there is a "Pure Saiyans" Category enemy 
starting from the 3rd turn from the start of battle, 
or starting from the 5th turn from 
the start of battle (once only)
